rows.label: qev025501_MSG0001
rows.name:
Ugh. I never should have started offering my repair
services to human customers... Big, big mistake.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0002
rows.name:
I'll fix something up, and and they just wreck it again.
No respect for their machines, right? No love.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0003
rows.name: Hmm? Did you also break something, perhaps?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0004
rows.name:
Sorry, but I'm full up at the moment, aren't I?
Can't take any new jobs till I work through this
backlog, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_JNK0010
rows.name: Correct

rows.label: qev025501_SEL0011
rows.name:
Explain to Sostenasa that you
have nothing in need of repair.

rows.label: qev025501_JNK0020
rows.name: Press

rows.label: qev025501_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Sostenasa if he hates humans.

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0005
rows.name:
Then I'll have to ask you to go, okay?
I've got to gather the materials I need here, don't I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0006
rows.name:
It's a full-time job cleaning up after the messes you
humans make, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0007
rows.name:
What? No. No no no. I wouldn't have opened a shop
here if I did, would I? I'm just...surprised at how little
you humans seem to care about your things, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0008
rows.name:
Fixing things you're just going to break again has
started feeling kind of pointless, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0009
rows.name:
I mean, you probably see machines as convenient things
you use up and throw away, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_JNK0030
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev025501_SEL0031
rows.name: Agree that's pretty much how you look at it.

rows.label: qev025501_JNK0040
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev025501_SEL0041
rows.name: Explain how you feel they're more than that.

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0010
rows.name:
Well, that's a tough mind-set to understand for a
Ma-non who grew up tinkering since he was old
enough to hold a screwdriver, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0011
rows.name:
Machines may not talk, but they've got a part of of of
the soul of whoever built or maintains them inside them,
don't they?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0012
rows.name:
Then you're the exception, yes? But I agree that
machines are more than mere tools.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0013
rows.name:
They've got a part of the soul of whoever built or
maintains them inside them, you see? And they
deserve to be handled with respect, don't they?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0014
rows.name:
Well, anyway, I've got to go stock up on materials to
get these repairs done, don't I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0015
rows.name:
I'm afraid I'm too busy to chat, so if you've got no
business, off you go, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_JNK0050
rows.name: Leave

rows.label: qev025501_SEL0051
rows.name: Depart as requested.

rows.label: qev025501_JNK0060
rows.name: Propose

rows.label: qev025501_SEL0061
rows.name: Offer to gather the materials for Sostenasa.

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0016
rows.name: See you around.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0017
rows.name:
All right then, yes? Which of of you poor kids needs
repairs the worst...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0018
rows.name:
Wait. You want to...to help me?
Is there an ulterior motive here? It's pity, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0019
rows.name:
Hmm. I don't know what your angle is, but if you're
offering, I'm agreeable, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0020
rows.name:
It's not easy though, yes? Even repairing a kitchen
appliance can mean trekking outside the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0021
rows.name:
Are you sure you still want to help gather materials?
Really really sure?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0022
rows.name:
Well, it's your call. But if you say you'll do it,
I really need you to follow through, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0023
rows.name:
These may just look like busted machines to you,
but to me my patients are living creatures, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0024
rows.name:
So please go find me some shiny new parts to patch
this poor broken kitchen appliance up, all right?
And I'll keep my expectations low. So so low.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0025
rows.name:
If you find me five pieces of stripped plating and three
quality fuses, then I can have this poor little guy as
good as new, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0026
rows.name:
The little guy helped you humans even after being
flown out to this crazy planet. We can't just abandon
it now, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0027
rows.name:
Hmm. Don't bother telling me. You couldn't find any
stripped plating or quality fuses, could you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0028
rows.name:
Well, I wasn't really counting on on on it anyway.
Now, if you'd please please leave me to my work?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0029
rows.name:
What? You went outside the city, yes?
Put your life at risk for this appliance?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0030
rows.name:
You're really not like all the other humans who who
who abuse their machines, are you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_JNK0070
rows.name: Affirm

rows.label: qev025501_SEL0071
rows.name: Say that machines should be handled with respect.

rows.label: qev025501_JNK0080
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev025501_SEL0081
rows.name: Claim that you're no different from any other human.

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0031
rows.name: Your eyes say you're telling the truth, don't they?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0032
rows.name:
Other humans are also...like you? Then why do they
keep manhandling their things and throwing the broken
ones at me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0033
rows.name:
...Because everyone here is desperate to survive?
And that given the chance and better circumstances,
humans will actually care for their things?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0034
rows.name:
Er, but no. No no no. I don't believe it.
Ever since I've been here, I've seenâ€”[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0035
rows.name:
Sostenasa?! Have you finished the repairs on the two
military vehicles I asked about?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0036
rows.name: You mean the two vehicles the BLADEs ruined, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0037
rows.name:
So so sorry, but I still don't have the the the parts I
need, do I? So I haven't been able to work on them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0038
rows.name:
The humans make do with their scant resources, right?
I don't hear them making excuses.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0039
rows.name:
Keep dragging your feet, and I'll test my new inventions
out on just you like I did in in in the old days.
I've got a flamethrower in the works, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0040
rows.name:
Wh-whoa! No no! Please no! I...I...I can find the oil
somewhere, but Earth-made windshield glass is near
impossible! I'm doing my best, okay?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_JNK0090
rows.name: Propose

rows.label: qev025501_SEL0091
rows.name: Offer to track down what Sostenasa needs.

rows.label: qev025501_JNK0100
rows.name: Do Nothing

rows.label: qev025501_SEL0101
rows.name: Keep silent and watch their exchange further.

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0041
rows.name:
The humans need those vehicles right away, don't they,
Sostenasa? Now which is it? Repair them, or try your
luck with my flamethrower?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0042
rows.name:
Fine, yes? Fine! I'll put them at the top of my list,
all right? Very very very top![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0043
rows.name: ...Sorry, but it looks like I have to head out, don't I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0044
rows.name: Here. As thanks for your help, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0045
rows.name:
I'm glad to see there are SOME humans who aren't a
total lost cause, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0046
rows.name:
...Good luck with your work too, okay?
I guess I'll see you around.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0047
rows.name: Er, you'd really do that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0048
rows.name:
Why all the help? This is my job, isn't it?
There's no reason for you to go this far.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_JNK0110
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev025501_SEL0111
rows.name:
Tell Sostenasa it's only natural
for one citizen to help another.

rows.label: qev025501_JNK0120
rows.name: Shrug

rows.label: qev025501_SEL0121
rows.name: Say you just kinda...feel like it.

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0049
rows.name: ...You're the first person in this city to to to say that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0050
rows.name:
There's something special about you, isn't there?
Are you sure you're even human?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0051
rows.name:
I'm starting to think that I was too quick to judge your
kind, perhaps?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0052
rows.name:
Maybe I was just cranky from being so so overworked,
yes? Stress and all that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0053
rows.name: Heh...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0054
rows.name:
Anyway, I appreciate it, okay? And while you're
hunting down the parts, I'll fix this poor appliance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0055
rows.name:
The materials I need are honey oil from a cinicula,
and windshield glass from a scrapped vehicle, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0056
rows.name:
For the scrapped vehicle, I think there might be one
on the East Gate Plain?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0057
rows.name:
I repaired that appliance good as new and returned the
little guy to the owner, didn't I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0058
rows.name:
She was a BLADE, you see? Badly injured.
Couldn't cook a decent meal for herself without it.
Good thing I got to it early, no?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0059
rows.name:
Any luck with those materials yet?
I need honey oil and windshield glass, remember?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0060
rows.name:
These things aren't easy to find, are they?
Must have been lots and lots of trouble, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_JNK0130
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev025501_SEL0131
rows.name: Confirm that it was pretty rough.

rows.label: qev025501_JNK0140
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev025501_SEL0141
rows.name: Boast that it was easy.

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0061
rows.name:
I believe it, okay? But but I still don't understand why
you'd go through that just to help me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0062
rows.name:
You say that, but but I know the truth, okay?
I've nearly died trying to get them in the past.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0063
rows.name:
I don't understand why you'd go to such lengths just to
help me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0064
rows.name:
What's that? You feel responsible because I'm fixing
these things for BLADE?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0065
rows.name: Dammit...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0066
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0067
rows.name: Fine, okay? I concede defeat![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0068
rows.name:
The reason my brother's working as a mechanic for
you humans...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0069
rows.name:
And the reason I decided to start a repair shop here,
for that matter...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0070
rows.name:
It's because we knew that both our peoples could make
it on this planet if we worked together, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0071
rows.name:
I got so busy, I lost sight of that, didn't I?
So so so simple, but I still forgot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0072
rows.name:
Well, I'm not about to get all gushy with thank-yous.
That's not the kind of of of Ma-non I am.
So just shut up and take this, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0073
rows.name: Hmph... You're a BLADE, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0074
rows.name:
Well, you all can bring the stuff you break here any
time you want, all right? I'll fix it till I drop.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0075
rows.name:
Just promise you'll use it to keep us all safe,
okay? Teamwork and all that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_JNK0150
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev025501_SEL0151
rows.name: Nod enthusiastically.

rows.label: qev025501_JNK0160
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev025501_SEL0161
rows.name: Explain to Sostenasa that you didn't do this out of guilt.

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0076
rows.name:
We're in this together, right? You won't hear me
whining like I'm the the the victim ever again, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0077
rows.name:
Then why have you been helping me?
I don't understand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0078
rows.name:
Perhaps I don't need to know. One look at your
face tells me it's a reason I can get behind, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025501_MSG0079
rows.name:
So good luck out there, yes?
I'll hold down the fort around here.[ST:wait ]
